Bombing suspect's lawyers want to photograph him

Dzhokhar Tsarnaev's attorneys would use the photos to challenge whether he was fit enough to voluntarily provide statements to investigators after his arrest, according to court papers. (3:40 p.m.)

Patriots tight end Rob Gronkowski may need back surgery, according to a report in USA Today. (3:59 p.m.)

No reprieve for Greig; 8-year sentence upheld

An appeals court ruled that it found no reason to change the 8-year sentence that Catherine Greig received. (4:29 p.m.)
  • Bulger lawyers oppose background checks on jurors

Man charged in assault on Brown student freed

A defense lawyer said that an assault that left a Brown University student from Norwood with severe head injuries was an act of self-defense. (4:31 p.m.)
